description:
You asked and we delivered. All your request have been taking into account. Here are a few updates. Now you can take your time or race against the clock. With the new quote system, the quotes are from you! Save up to three quotes and other people will be trying to unlock your quotes. When you beat a level, you unlock someone's quote and get to vote on it -- Love it or Hate it.
*************************************
So you think you can shoot? From sound effects (you can  disable them) to bubble explosions, you will like this game. The game tracks your finger movements. Slide your finger to aim and tap to shoot. You can also use the keyboard (Q/w, o/P, spacebar, and the almighty u to undo). The controls are easy, but do you have the skills to group your targets and take them out? Can you score enough points to uncover the quotes hidden behind the bubbles? If you do, you will probably be a leading scorer and rank on our pop chart. Get it and start having fun playing this cool little game!
